string.name: HOUSING_1
string.i: "I told my mother-in-law that my house was her house, and she said, ‘Get the hell off my property.’"\n- Joan Rivers

string.name: HOUSING_2
string.i: "Where we love is home - home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts."\n- Oliver Wendell Holmes

string.name: HOUSING_3
string.i: "Cleaning your house while your kids are still growing up is like shoveling the walk before it stops snowing."\n- Phyllis Diller

string.name: HOUSING_4
string.i: "A house is not a home unless it contains food and fire for the mind as well as the body."\n- Benjamin Franklin

string.name: HOUSING_5
string.i: "Decorate your home. It gives the illusion that your life is more interesting than it really is."\n- Charles M. Schulz

string.name: ELECTRICITY_1
string.i: "Electricity is really just organized lightning."\n- George Carlin

string.name: ELECTRICITY_2
string.i: "And God said, 'Let there be light' and there was light, but the Electricity Board said He would have to wait until Thursday to be connected."\n- Spike Milligan

string.name: ELECTRICITY_3
string.i: "Benjamin Franklin may have discovered electricity, but it was the man who invented the meter who made the money."\n- Earl Wilson

string.name: WATER_1
string.i: "Water is the driving force of all nature."\n- Leonardo da Vinci

string.name: WATER_2
string.i: "Thousands have lived without love, not one without water."\n- W.H. Auden

string.name: WATER_3
string.i: "My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them."\n- Mitch Hedberg

string.name: WATER_4
string.i: "I believe that water is the only drink for a wise man."\n- Henry David Thoreau

string.name: WATER_5
string.i: "No water, no life. No blue, no green."\n- Sylvia Earle

string.name: PHONE_1
string.i: "As a teenager you are at the last stage in your life when you will be happy to hear that the phone is for you."\n- Fran Lebowitz

string.name: PHONE_2
string.i: "If you were going to die soon and had only one phone call you could make, who would you call and what would you say? And why are you waiting?"\n- Stephen Levine

string.name: PHONE_3
string.i: "Smartphones. Who cares? Smartphones. I only have dummy phones."\n- Don Rickles

string.name: PHONE_4
string.i: "If it's the Psychic Network, why do they need a phone number?"\n- Robin Williams

string.name: PHONE_5
string.i: "Telephone, n. An invention of the devil which abrogates some of the advantages of making a disagreeable person keep his distance."\n- Ambrose Bierce

string.name: INTERNET_1
string.i: "We are all now connected by the Internet, like neurons in a giant brain."\n- Stephen Hawking

string.name: INTERNET_2
string.i: "The internet is a great way to get on the net."\n- Bob Dole

string.name: INTERNET_3
string.i: "The internet is becoming the town square for the global village of tomorrow."\n- Bill Gates

string.name: INTERNET_4
string.i: "Getting information off the internet is like taking a drink from a fire hydrant."\n- Mitchell Kapor

string.name: CABLE_1
string.i: "I must say I find television very educational. The minute somebody turns it on, I go to the library and read a good book."\n- Groucho Marx

string.name: CABLE_2
string.i: "Television has brought back murder into the home - where it belongs."\n- Alfred Hitchcock

string.name: CABLE_3
string.i: "In Beverly Hills... they don't throw their garbage away. They make it into television shows."\n- Woody Allen

string.name: TRANSPORTATION_1
string.i: "The best car safety device is a rear-view mirror with a cop in it."\n- Dudley Moore

string.name: TRANSPORTATION_2
string.i: "Have you ever noticed that anybody driving slower than you is an idiot, and anyone going faster than you is a maniac?"\n- George Carlin

string.name: TRANSPORTATION_3
string.i: "I had to stop driving my car for a while... the tires got dizzy."\n- Steven Wright

string.name: TRANSPORTATION_4
string.i: "I often wonder how far I'd go for love. I guess it all depends on the price of gas."\n- Jarod Kintz

string.name: TRANSPORTATION_5
string.i: "The reason gas prices are so high is because the oil is in Texas and Oklahoma and all the dipsticks are in Washington."\n- Yakov Smirnoff

string.name: MEDICAL_1
string.i: "Never go to a doctor whose office plants have died."\n- Erma Bombeck

string.name: MEDICAL_2
string.i: "A hospital bed is a parked taxi with the meter running."\n- Groucho Marx

string.name: MEDICAL_3
string.i: "You may not be able to read a doctor's handwriting and prescription, but you'll notice his bills are neatly typewritten."\n- Earl Wilson

string.name: MEDICAL_4
string.i: "It is health that is real wealth, and not pieces of gold and silver."\n- Mahatma Gandhi

string.name: MEDICAL_5
string.i: "To keep the body in good health is a duty... otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear."\n- Buddha

string.name: DEBT_1
string.i: "Credit is an 'I love debt' score."\n- Dave Ramsey

string.name: DEBT_2
string.i: Never spend your money before you have it."\n- Thomas Jefferson

string.name: DEBT_3
string.i: "Debt is normal. Be weird."\n- Dave Ramsey

string.name: DEBT_4
string.i: "A bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don't need it."\n- Bob Hope

string.name: GROCERIES_1
string.i: "There is no sincerer love than the love of food."\n- George Bernard Shaw

string.name: GROCERIES_2
string.i: "Life expectancy would grow by leaps and bounds if green vegetables smelled as good as bacon."\n- Doug Larson

string.name: GROCERIES_3
string.i: "It's okay to eat fish because they don't have any feelings."\n- Kurt Cobain

string.name: GROCERIES_4
string.i: "When a man's stomach is full it makes no difference whether he is rich or poor."\n- Euripides

string.name: SAVINGS_1
string.i: "Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving."\n- Warren Buffet

string.name: SAVINGS_2
string.i: "Beware of little expenses; a small leak will sink a great ship."\n- Benjamin Franklin

string.name: SAVINGS_3
string.i: "Save your money. You're going to need twice as much money in your old age as you think."\n- Michael Caine

string.name: FUNMONEY_1
string.i: "Winning is only half of it. Having fun is the other half."\n- Bum Phillips

string.name: FUNMONEY_2
string.i: "Never, ever underestimate the importance of having fun."\n- Randy Pausch
